note:
Hello, everyone! I’m Glen, a writer from West London who loves to explore the dark and mysterious side of human nature. I’m so happy you’ve visited my website, where I’ll share updates, sneak peeks, and behind-the-scenes of my debut thriller novel. It’s the first of my planned series of novels that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

If you’re a fan of true crime, mystery, and suspense, you’ll love my novel and my page.
